These results reflect outputs for the 2026-2050 Regional Transportation Plan. Select topics from the Table of Contents panel to the left. Basic run settings are shown below:

```{python}
import toml
import os

config = toml.load(os.path.join(os.getcwd(),r'../../../configuration/input_configuration.toml'))
summary_config = toml.load(os.path.join(os.getcwd(), r'../../../configuration/summary_configuration.toml'))

# Relative path between notebooks and goruped output directories
output_path = os.path.join(summary_config['sc_run_path'],'..', summary_config["output_folder"])

print(f"Run location: {os.getcwd()}")
print("")
print(f"Model Year: {config['model_year']}")
print(f"Land Use Inputs: {os.path.join(config['soundcast_inputs_dir'],config['landuse_inputs'])}")
print(f"Network Inputs: {os.path.join(config['soundcast_inputs_dir'],config['network_inputs'])}")
```

Distance Pricing Settings in cents/mile (applied only if distance pricing is True)

```{python}

print(f"Distance pricing: {config['add_distance_pricing']}")
print("")
print(f"Morning: {config['distance_rate_dict']['am']}")
print(f"Mid-Day: {config['distance_rate_dict']['md']}")
print(f"Afternoon: {config['distance_rate_dict']['pm']}")
print(f"Evening: {config['distance_rate_dict']['ev']}")
print(f"Night: {config['distance_rate_dict']['ni']}")
print("")

```
